name: Mauro Refosco
description:
'''Mauro Refosco''' (born 16 October 1966), is a Brazilian [[Percussion instrument|percussionist]]. He is best known for his work with singer [[David Byrne]] and the American [[rock (music)|rock]] band [[Red Hot Chili Peppers]]. He was a member of the experimental [[supergroup (music)|supergroup]] [[Atoms for Peace (band)|Atoms for Peace]] – featuring [[Thom Yorke]] and [[Flea (musician)|Flea]] – and the [[forró]] band [[Forro in the Dark]]. Refosco was also briefly a member of [[Dirty Projectors]].

Since 2019, Refosco has appeared as one of the principal musicians in the [[Broadway theatre|Broadway]] show, ''[[American Utopia (film)|American Utopia]]'', featuring David Byrne and his music.
